name: natural stone plate production, polished | natural stone plate, polished | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/6831/documentation

The polishing is assumed to be done using a polishing machine and very fine grinding medium. No losses are taken into account as no data are available. The dust emissions are estimated based on the losses (0.05 mm abrasion around the granite plate with geometry of 0.5 * 0.5 * 0.03 m and a weight of 2?750 kg/m3).;[This dataset was already contained in the ecoinvent database version 2. It was not individually updated during the transfer to ecoinvent version 3. Life Cycle Impact Assessment results may still have changed, as they are affected by changes in the supply chain, i.e. in other datasets. This dataset was generated following the ecoinvent quality guidelines for version 2. It may have been subject to central changes described in the ecoinvent version 3 change report (http://www.ecoinvent.org/database/ecoinvent-version-3/reports-of-changes/), and the results of the central updates were reviewed extensively. The changes added e.g. consistent water flows and other information throughout the database. The documentation of this dataset can be found in the ecoinvent reports of version 2, which are still available via the ecoinvent website. The change report linked above covers all central changes that were made during the conversion process.]



Basis is a ground natural granite plate in a storage. Beside infrastructure some internal transports are included. No administration and wear and spare parts are taken into account. Dust is accounted for.
